name: Modern Rikshaw Drive
description:
Modern Rikshaw Drive offer you the opportunity to earn cash by providing rickshaw driver services to road passengers and city tourists in different areas of Miami city. Drive rickshaw like expert tuk tuk driver on the road of city highways and show your driving skills in this auto rickshaw simulator. Get ready to experience the city ride on tuk tuk rickshaw and become best auto rickshaw driver in rickshaw driving games. In city traffic, you have to pick city tourists like professional driver from different bus stop points and reach the final destination in limited time to successfully complete the different game levels of tuk tuk driving simulator 2018.

Features:
• Realistic environment of city traffic
• Become auto rickshaw driver
• Best rickshaw simulator game in the world
• Off road Tuk Tuk rickshaw simulator
• Pick and drop service for passengers
• Parking rickshaw at parking stand
• Tuk Tuk driving simulator 2018
• Rickshaw sounds and amazing 3D graphics
